channel.title: About on vladisl0th
channel.description: Recent content in About on vladisl0th

item.description: Hack The Planet! So I have finally decided to join the ranks of web developers, ditching the previous notion of using bloated dynamic sites (I’m looking at you WordPress), I have circum to suckless web development and I can finally focus on writing instead of having to centre divs. If you don’t already know me, I am Vlad. I like computers, this website will serve as a repository for my personal notes and explorations into the vast and vastly exciting world of computer science, and beyond!
